title: A Separate peace. - [Edited version]
creator_credit: Paramount Communications, Robert A. Goldston, Otto Plaschkes, Larry Peerce and John Knowles
brief_description: An edited version of the feature film based on the book of the same name by John Knowles. Depicts Knowles’ moving investigation of the loyalty and betrayal of friendship. Original feature film was produced in 1972.
